head: How does it work?
step1: You practice exercises in the web-app.
step2: Every exercise gives you detailed feedback.
step3: The app tracks what you're struggling with.
step4: You get more exercises on your level.

logInError.title: Log-in unsuccessful
logInError.invalidAuthentication: We could not determine your identity. If possible try another account.
logInError.internalError: A server error occurred while logging in. Please try again later.
logInError.unspecifiedError: Something went wrong while logging in. Please try again later.
